body.name: AISHUJIE Broom with Dustpan Combo Set - 52'' Long Handle Broom and Dustpan Set with Self-Cleaning Teeth & Standing Dust Pan and Broom for Home Office Kitchen Lobby Floor Use
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 41 mins
features: Say Goodbye To Bending Down! Our broom and dustpan set features an ergonomically designed sliding handle. Ergonomically designed sliding grip part providing a comfortable grip even in cold weather. The broom extendable handle reaches up to 51.18 inches, adjustable for height to provide a more comfortable cleaning experience

Upgrade Heavy-Duty Broom Bristles: The broom set is equipped with high-quality, durable bristles made from recycled PET bottles. Our four-row bristle structure with U-shaped pins ensures that the bristles stay intact, so you never have to worry about losing them. Dense and long-lasting, they'll tackle any mess with ease

Seamless Dustpan Rubber Lip & Self-Cleaning Comb Teeth: Broom with dustpan combo set with rubber lip that fits snugly against the floor and dustpan, effectively sweeping up all crumbs, dirt, and debris in one go. Plus, long handle large capacity dust pan comes with built-in comb teeth that make cleaning up pet and human hair a breeze. No need to use your hands or struggle with messy clumps!

Space-saving Storage: Our broom with stand up dustpan set offers a unique standing design. Just rotate the dustpan 90 degrees and attach it to the broom, and voila! It stands upright, saving precious storage space in your home or office. Keep things neat and organized, all while adding a touch of convenience to your space

Versatile Use & Reliable Customer Support: This broom dustpan set is perfect for both indoor and outdoor use. Whether you need to clean your home, office, garage, or patio. Also! Customer satisfaction is our top priority. If you have any issues or questions regarding our broom and dustpan combo set, our friendly and dedicated customer service team is here to assist you

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose AISHUJIE broom and dustpan set? Long handles allow you to stand upright and sweep comfortably without bending over.The lip of the dustpan fits seamlessly with the ground for dust-free sweeping.The dustpan teeth can easily scrape the hair on the broom wire into the dustpan without manual cleaning.Unique broom sliding grip, ergonomically designed to make sweeping tasks more comfortable and without worrying about cold weather. High Quality Broom With Dustpan Combo Set
Compact Upright Storage The foldable dustpan set can be compactly stored upright in a small corner, saving space and keeping your home tidy and clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything I could want
reviews.reviewText: I was a little skeptical about buying this type of broom/dustpan. I was looking for a quality broom, but most brooms hate me. The fibers end up sticking out every which way and the debris gets caught in them. Well, so far, this is a joy. The fibers are pretty stiff (but still soft enough to sweep) and everything gets in the pan which has a nice rubber edge. But the best thing of all is the way that it takes on the dustbunnies! I hate to clean and usually accumulate a lot of them and they normally get stuck in my broom so I have to bend over and remove them with my hand. The prongs on this dustpan easily remove the dustbunnies and your broom is good to go. You can do quite a bit of sweeping before you need to empty the bin and the set stands upright, so nothing falls out. The actual broom is much sturdier than I expected it to be and the adjustable grip makes it easier to sweep. I highly recommend this broom set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy broom/dustpan with no bending!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and great for cleanup without the bending as with a floor dustpan. I've had other versions of this broom/long-handled dustpan but this one is the best at actually sweeping everything into the dustpan without leaving debris behind on the floor. I would highly recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it made my cleaning tasks easier
reviews.reviewText: I have to say, this broom combo set has been an incredible addition to my cleaning routine. With its 52'' long handle and thoughtful features like self-cleaning teeth and a standing dustpan, it has completely outperformed my previous broom and dustpan set, which I purchased at Walmart. The quality of this set is truly exceptional. The materials used are of a much higher standard, ensuring durability and reliability for all my cleaning needs. This set is built to last, and I can already feel the difference in its performance. Not to mention, it adds a touch of elegance to my home with its stylish design. It's a step up from other, lower-priced alternatives, and while it might come with a slightly higher price tag, the improved quality and aesthetics make it a worthwhile investment in the long run. In summary, this broom set has not only made my cleaning tasks easier but has also added a touch of sophistication to my living space. I am thoroughly impressed with the improved build quality, innovative features, and appealing design. The slightly higher cost is definitely worth it for the enhanced cleaning experience and the aesthetic value it brings to my home.
